channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside Meghan Markle's real kitchen - 'weathered' look, butler's pantry and secret photo
item.description: Fans of the Duchess has finally been given a glimpse inside her real family kitchen at the home she shares with Prince Harry - and it includes a poign...

item.title: Major update in tragic case of Brit couple found dead in horror scene at French home
item.description: The bodies of Andrew and Dawn Searle, who friends described as "comfortable" and "happy", were discovered on February 6 in their home in Les Pequies s...

item.title: M5 closed near Oldbury after body is found in road sparking huge investigation
item.description: West Midlands Police said they have closed the motorway in both directions at Oldbury/Quinton following the grim discovery of a person's body, sparkin...

item.title: Chef says we should add 'prized' ingredient to cod - it's not what you'd expect
item.description: A chef has shared a clever way to add extra flavour to your oven-baked cod with a simple ingredient that you might not think to add to the fish but is...

item.title: Inside mind of evil dad Chris Watts who murdered pregnant wife and daughters
item.description: Chris Watts murdered his pregnant wife Shanann and their two daughters, four-year-old Bella and three-year-old Celeste, in August 2018

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
item.description: 'I saw a ship or something in trouble.'

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred

item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.
